claim: Members of the Ukrainian Armed Forces helped produce a Bollywood-style video that started going viral in May 2023.

Video_information.video_headline: Feed this cringe directly into my veins. Ukraine is now producing war propaganda in the style of Bollywood dance videos.
Video_information.video_transcript: Стійте, Зупиніться! Виконати завдання! Вперед! А хто сказав, що дівчата не можуть керувати дроном? Нали ворога з Херсону аж до самого кордону! Він підготував Залужний подаруночок, потужний! Наху-наху-наху! Курко я навчись літати, хтось неба спалити вату, Наближаю перемогу, чуєш,
Video_information.Video_descriptor: The video opens with a vibrant scene in a sunny courtyard where a group of men in camouflage uniforms dance energetically together, creating a lively atmosphere that is further enhanced by the appearance of a woman in a yellow dress who joins their movement, adding a splash of color and elegance to the spectacle. As the scene transitions, the focus shifts to a separate group of men in fatigues dancing in the same courtyard, showcasing the camaraderie among military personnel. The men in camouflage uniforms reappear, this time dancing alongside a woman in a stylish white dress, suggesting a continued theme of blending military and civilian life through celebration. The video then takes the viewer to a different courtyard, where the same group of fatigued men performs their dance once again, reinforcing the joy and unity of the occasion. Ultimately, the video concludes in a fourth courtyard, with the men in camouflage uniforms once more showcasing their dance, signifying a joyful culmination of the festivities captured throughout the various settings. These scenes unfold against urban backdrops that feature buildings and open public spaces, setting an informal yet celebratory mood, emphasized by the vibrant mix of colorful dresses worn by the women and the energetic presence of the men in uniform, suggesting a fusion of military pride and communal celebration.
